task.title: Install and Run DITA-OT
task.shortdesc: What we're going to do: Install and run DITA-OT using the Windows CLI on the local machine, build a pdf file using the DITA-OT sample topics.

step.cmd: Download the DITA-OT distribution package from https://www.dita-ot.org/download and unpack the zip file.
Navigate to Control Panel > System Advanced System Settings > Environment Variables and add the full path to the bin folder of the DITA-OT installation to the Path system variable.
Open a command window and navigate to the DITA-OT bin folder.
In the DITA-OT bin folder, run the dita command and supply the path to the sample source files and output format.
Check the generated pdf file in C:\dita-ot-3.0.4\bin\out to verify output.
